scripts.start: if test "$API_ENV" = "true" ; then yarn start:api ; else yarn start:dev ; fi
scripts.release:
./node_modules/.bin/lerna version --no-push && echo "Release has been tagged!
Please look over the CHANGELOG.md file, and use 'git commit -amend' to amend any edits.
When done, be sure to 'git push --tags' and create a release PR"
scripts.deploy: now --public --team apolloschurch --token $NOW_TOKEN --docker && now alias --team apolloschurch --token $NOW_TOKEN && now rm apollos-church-api --team apolloschurch --safe --yes --token $NOW_TOKEN && npm run publish-schema
scripts.nuke:node: rm -rdf ./node_modules packages/*/node_modules && yarn cache clean && yarn
scripts.postinstall: lerna run postinstall && lerna run build
